featured.text: Decorative or sticker bindis come in all sizes, colors and variations, and can be worn by young and old, married and unmarried people alike.
She said they were married on May 26, while my dad’s memory told him it was June 25.
According to Hindu beliefs, the color red is believed to bring good fortune to the married couple.

definition.zh_def: 已婚的，指與另一人結為合法配偶的狀態。
definition.en_def: Having a spouse; in a legal union with another person.
definition.example: They have been married for ten years.
